code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SendMessage=()=>{const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const[phoneNumber,setPhoneNumber]=useState("");const sendMessage=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post("https://messaging.googleapis.com/v1/messages:send",{phoneNumber:"962608100",message:{text:message}},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"}});console.log("Message sent successfully:",response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error sending message:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Phone Number",value:phoneNumber,onChange:e=>setPhoneNumber(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Message",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,children:"Send Message"})]});};export default SendMessage;
